languages.text: "Вы оба заслуживаете наказания. Блюстителя, злоупотребляющего властью, разжаловать, а вора — высечь".
"You both deserve punishment. Strip the arbitrary enforcer of his rank and give lashes to the thief."
languages.original_text: "Вы оба заслуживаете наказания. Блюстителя, злоупотребляющего властью, разжаловать, а вора — высечь".

traits.locale_text: "You both deserve punishment. Strip the arbitrary enforcer of his rank and give lashes to the thief."
"You both deserve punishment. Strip the arbitrary enforcer of his rank and give lashes to the thief."

"You both deserve punishment. Strip the arbitrary enforcer of his rank and give lashes to the thief."

languages.text: «Ambos merecéis un castigo. Retiren al guardia de su posición y fustiguen al ladrón».
languages.original_text: "You both deserve punishment. Strip the arbitrary enforcer of his rank and give lashes to the thief."

traits.locale_text: «Ambos merecéis un castigo. Retiren al guardia de su posición y fustiguen al ladrón».

languages.text: 「二人とも罰に値する。エンフォーサーの地位を剥奪し、泥棒には鞭打ちを与えるんだ」
languages.original_text: "You both deserve punishment. Strip the arbitrary enforcer of his rank and give lashes to the thief."

traits.locale_text: 「二人とも罰に値する。エンフォーサーの地位を剥奪し、泥棒には鞭打ちを与えるんだ」

languages.text: “你们两个都该受到惩罚。给我剥夺这个执法者的军衔，对偷东西的家伙实施鞭刑。”
languages.original_text: "You both deserve punishment. Strip the arbitrary enforcer of his rank and give lashes to the thief."

traits.locale_text: “你们两个都该受到惩罚。给我剥夺这个执法者的军衔，对偷东西的家伙实施鞭刑。”

languages.text: "Ihr verdient beide eine Strafe. Der willkürliche Enforcer wird degradiert und der Dieb geschlagen."
languages.original_text: "You both deserve punishment. Strip the arbitrary enforcer of his rank and give lashes to the thief."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr verdient beide eine Strafe. Der willkürliche Enforcer wird degradiert und der Dieb geschlagen."

languages.text: « Vous méritez tous les deux d'être punis. Qu'on démette ce tyran de prévôt de ses fonctions et qu'on donne le fouet au voleur. »
languages.original_text: "You both deserve punishment. Strip the arbitrary enforcer of his rank and give lashes to the thief."

traits.locale_text: « Vous méritez tous les deux d'être punis. Qu'on démette ce tyran de prévôt de ses fonctions et qu'on donne le fouet au voleur. »

languages.text: "Her ikiniz de cezayı hak ediyorsunuz. Despot infazcının rütbesini elinden alın ve hırsıza kamçı vurun."
languages.original_text: "You both deserve punishment. Strip the arbitrary enforcer of his rank and give lashes to the thief."
